name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: This course will introduce students to the history and development of film studies, with an emphasis on understanding the various critical approaches used to analyze and interpret films.

name: History of Cinema
description: This course will explore the history of cinema from its beginnings to the present day, including the evolution of film theory and technology.

name: Film Genres and Theory
description: This course will introduce students to the various genres of film, as well as exploring the various critical theories used to analyze and interpret films.

name: Film Criticism
description: This course will focus on the practice of film criticism and the various methods and approaches used to analyze and interpret films.
